title: Poopys Ult is so BS
body: like seriously she should be cc able but take no damage not just run into team kill adc run out its bs like tryn and kayle can be ccd while ult is active

replies.body: if she targets someone with CC...its their job to CC...simple.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XnRGIZ9y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-28T13:34:19.681+0000)
>
> if she targets someone with CC...its their job to CC...simple.

adc can cc?

> [{quoted}](name=Mar3thyu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XnRGIZ9y,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-28T13:35:16.734+0000)
>
> adc can cc?



Yes they can, and here is a list:

{{champion:22}} can use her ult to stun and run away
{{champion:51}} can drop a trap at her feet net away
{{champion:42}} can Valkyrie away
{{champion:119}} can use "stand aside then blood rush away
{{champion:81}} can arcane shift and Q to slow (frozen fist needed)
{{champion:104}} can smoke screen and dash away
{{champion:222}} can zap, trap and run away
{{champion:429}} can ult for knockup Q for the distance and kite away
{{champion:96}} can drop void ozze and run away
{{champion:236}} can dash away (outrun if has ghostblade)
{{champion:21}}  no CC available
{{champion:133}} can blind, vault then ult away
{{champion:15}} can spell shield the engage and ult away
{{champion:17}} can blind, shroom the run away (speedboost)
{{champion:18}} can knockback with ult and jump away
{{champion:29}} can go invis, slow and runaway
{{champion:6}} does urgot things
{{champion:110}} can ult and run away
{{champion:67}} condemn, ult go invis and run away



i think i've made my point
You'd find that Mis Fortune has a slow on her E.

yeah, OP also has poor reading comprehension.

i said IF she targets someone with CC its their job to CC....

but yeah, a LARGE % of ADCs have some form of CC...

The challenge for Poppy is somehow getting fed to the point this could happen (since if unfed her ulti is pretty useless as she doesn't do enough damage to warrant any kill), a rework is on its way to replace the current Poppy though, not sure when it'll be out.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XnRGIZ9y,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-28T18:51:15.437+0000)
>
> The challenge for Poppy is somehow getting fed to the point this could happen (since if unfed her ulti is pretty useless as she doesn't do enough damage to warrant any kill), a rework is on its way to replace the current Poppy though, not sure when it'll be out.

its jg poppy though how hard is it to get ganks and kills?

Why dont you play her and find out?

learn how she works so you know how to handle it?
